resources.string: The device time must be properly set before receiving data. This may take up to a minute.
Verify real-time sensor data is working. Received data will be displayed.
Check the vehicle for any engine codes.
Great! Now we should collect some information from the car, please wait for a few minutes. This will roughly take 5 minutes.
Press End Test before unplugging the device so that this test will count towards your reward of $100.
